title: Mastermind of Deceptions
Code Wizard
Lore Guardian
Architect of Prototype Cards
Curator of Atmosphere
text: As the leader, Samuel has overseen the project's game dynamics, ensuring a balanced and engaging gameplay experience. He's adept at navigating the intricate trade-offs inherent in game design, refining the rule book to ensure clarity and coherence. Additionally, Samuel meticulously documents meeting logs, fostering effective communication and collaboration among team members, which is crucial for the project's success.

Andrei's expertise lies in creating the project's online presence with a dedicated website. He's also delved into the intricacies of game mechanics through flowcharts and quantitative analysis. Additionally, he's been instrumental in determining game duration and refining mechanics through extensive playtesting, while also crafting the game's cards.

Tino has enriched the game's world with captivating backstory, weaving a narrative tapestry that immerses players in a mediaeval fantasy realm. His contributions add depth and intrigue to the game experience, making every decision feel like a part of a larger story.

Fatemah has played a vital role in the project by creating prototype cards, offering tangible representations of the game's mechanics and concepts. Her expertise lies in crafting functional prototypes that serve as a foundation for further development and refinement. Through her contributions, Fatemah has provided the team with essential tools for testing and iteration, helping to shape the game's direction and gameplay experience.

Gurbaj has contributed to the project by curating the moodboard, offering a selection of imagery and aesthetics to help establish the desired atmosphere for the mediaeval fantasy world. Through his efforts, Gurbaj has provided a foundational reference point for the game's ambiance, contributing to the overall thematic cohesion of the project
